system.description: You are able to make Zigzagoon-Class Sandwiches as a Camp Action. In addition to their usual effects, these sandwiches confer a +20 on one skill check of your choosing in the following day. Some diners find themselves oddly unable to walk in a straight line after eating these sandwiches.
